result.markdown:
An initial search of Econlit database yielded the following:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
count_bibtex_articles("prisma/EBSCO-Metadata-01_24_2026.bibtex")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Total entries: 43 
Entries by type:
types
article  inbook    book    misc 
     19      18       4       2 
```


:::
:::


After screening for relevance:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
count_bibtex_relevant("prisma/EBSCO-Metadata-01_24_2026.bibtex")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Total entries: 43 
Relevant entries: 36 
```


:::
:::


An initial search of Taylor and Francis for defence AND offsets yielded 562,330 results which were ordered by relevance. 

Downloading 2000 records (the cap) and screening for manually relevance yielded 45 relevant records. 200 records were screened for relevance, after around 80 records there were no addition hits. 

A search of google scholar for defence offsets yielded about 57,400 results
